queries.query: SELECT OBJECT_NAME(ps.object_id) as tbl, i.name as [Index], ROUND(ps.avg_fragmentation_in_percent, 2) as Fragmentation, ps.page_count as PageCount, ps.index_id as IndexId FROM sys.dm_db_index_physical_stats(DB_ID(), NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL) ps JOIN sys.indexes i ON ps.object_id = i.object_id AND ps.index_id = i.index_id ORDER BY ps.avg_fragmentation_in_percent DESC
